metadata.Name: JAFFE
metadata.Description: The JAFFE dataset is a collection of facial expression images. It has been used in many studies on facial expression recognition.
metadata.Paper Title: Excavating AI” Re-excavated: Debunking a Fallacious Account of the JAFFE Dataset
metadata.Abstract: The JAFFE (Japanese Female Facial Expression) dataset is a widely used benchmark for facial expression recognition. However, a recent paper (“Excavating AI”) claims that the dataset is biased and contains inaccurate labels. In this paper, we re-examine the JAFFE dataset and debunk the claims made in “Excavating AI”. We show that the dataset is not as biased as claimed and that the labels are generally accurate. We also provide a more detailed analysis of the dataset and discuss its limitations.
